entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Span<T> vs Span<String> difference in Morph: Structs/AddrExp #65815
  • Assertion failed '(intrinsic == NI_Vector128_As) || ...' in 'System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector256:Dot(System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector256`1[Vector`1],System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector256`1[Vector`1]):System.Numerics.Vector`1[Single]' #65814
  • [net7 Preview1][hot reload] Adding new methods in blazor wasm asserts at debug-mono-ppdb.c:499 #65808
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add more granular Interfaces to System.INumber<T> #65807
  • [API Proposal]: QUIC should have an IsSupported API #65802
  • `GC\Features\SustainedLowLatency\scenario` fails #65797
  • [wasm] `System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.CloseTest.CloseOutputAsync_ClientInitiated_CanReceive_CanClose` failing on browser #65796
  • System.IO.Tests work item failing with SIGKILL #65791
  • Unnecessary LdelemaRef call not elided with Volatile.Read #65789
    7.0.0
  • Performance cliff with StringBuilder.Append(AppendInterpolatedStringHandler) #65788
  • .NET Core 3.1 - AsmMacros.inc - memory operand not aligned by 16 causing Access violation (0xc0000005) #65787
  • System.Xml.EncodingStreamWrapper.ReadBOMEncoding allocates 4 x byte[] due to Stream.ReadByte calls #65786
  • Non-generic Enum.TryParse(Type, string, out object?) seems to be missing [NotNullWhen(true)]? #65784
  • [API Proposal]: Add a generic overload for SerializationInfo.GetValue(string name, Type type) #65783
  • Q: track remote state using Task #65782
  • System.Data.SqlClient unloadability #65781
  • Use Fast-Mod algorithm for native EEHashTableBase #65778
  • CopyContext in Thread::RedirectCurrentThreadAtHandledJITCase sometimes fails #65776
    7.0.0
  • Repeatedly initialize the static variables s_defaultSimpleConverters and s_defaultFactoryConverters when calling the method GetConverter of JsonSerializerOptions #65770
    7.0.0
  • When Regional format is set to Thai LastIndexOf and IndexOf return wrong value in case searched string starts with a special character. #65812
  • [API Proposal]: DependencyRootEntryAttribute #65764
  • [API Proposal]: Can DispatchProxy support "Create<TProxy>(Type interfaceType) where TProxy : DispatchProxy"? #65761
  • Consider removing apiset files from self-contained apps #65758
  • Confusing environment variable configuration prefix behaviour reintroduced in 6.0.2 #65756
  • NativeAOT: Export native methods from referenced assemblies. #65755
  • ZipArchive corrupts files with unicode characters #65750
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: make interface of Array and List classes more uniform #65677
  • Should the DllImportGenerator be packable or not? #65495
    7.0.0
  • ReloadOnChange of AddJsonFile is invalid in kubernetes - not fixed #64222
  • [wasm] allow the debug proxy to startup on a fixed port #65209
    7.0.0
  • Use of CoreCLR GC in conservative stack scanning mode #61919
  • .NET 6 with specific Dynatrace versions does not start up in a AKS, and produces no logs #64760
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Guid.NewNonCryptographicGuid #65736
  • Change default of SslServerAuthenticationOptions.AllowRenegotiation to be false #65547
    7.0.0
  • HttpTelemetry instrumentation for HTTP/3 #40896
    7.0.0
  • Interop on Mac causes process to exit with return code 0 #62454
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite unloadability #65780
  • relation of CancellationTokenSource.TryReset and Dispose #65765
  • FileStream's BufferedFileStreamStrategy lacks GC.SuppressFinalize(this) call causing it eligible for Finalization Queue #64741
    7.0.0
  • SslStream_RequireClientCert_IsMutuallyAuthenticated_ReturnsTrue failing on Windows 11 #65539
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Faster comparison against Vector128<>.Zero #63829
    Future
  • Possible race condition in Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory #63764
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.ImpersonatedAuthTests.DefaultHandler_ImpersonatedUser_Success #65712
    7.0.0
  • Test failure WindowsIdentityImpersonatedTests.RunImpersonated_NameResolution #65648
  • Regressions in System.Net.Primitives.Tests.IPAddressPerformanceTests #65512
  • [Wasm][AOT][net7] `* Assertion at mini-llvm.c:13272, condition *nullable_count > 0 not met` #65325
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove checks and settings for Internal.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe since that type is gone #65809
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix nullability mismatch between `ref` and `src` in `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #65804
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui version info to stored data. Runtime Side #65800
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter recreating built-in converters #65799
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Update windows build machines #65798
  • [wasm] Use INITIAL_MEMORY instead of TOTAL_MEMORY #65790
    area-Build-mono
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #65785
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Remove reference projects from nearly all out-of-band projects #65775
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Refactor script to load NPM modules for NodeJS on Helix #65774
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Mark SslProtocols.Tls and SslProtocols.Tls11 as obsolete #65773
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/6.0][EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65768
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #65766
    area-System.IO
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Misc Debugger improvements (including tests) #65752
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Delete unicode-data.h and related code, cleanup unused eglib functions #65751
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Change default bool marshalling for generated P/Invokes to be 1-byte non-normalized #65749
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Merged

  • Revert "[release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon (#64104)" #65794
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Port of #60580 #65811
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Disable packaging for DllImportGenerator for now #65795
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup platform-specific ifdefs #65624
  • [wasm][debugger] Add per-test ids, and save logs to files for the test, and proxy messages #63564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] submit some compiling depended files. #65769
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Make NegotiatedCipherSuiteTests.SupportedNonTls13CipherSuites lazy #65771
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Change default of SslServerAuthenticationOptions.AllowRenegotiation to false #65777
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change
  • Implement HttpTelemetry for HTTP/3 #65644
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate some HWI codegen code #65302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [docs] Create mono-thread-state-machine.md #65720
    documentation, area-Threading-mono
  • [EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65365
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix unwanted session caching in mutual authentication tests #65739
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Faster vector == Vector128.Zero on arm64 #65632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][tests] Fix use of `RandomTest*Orderer` with trimming #65754
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework
  • Fix entrypoint name in TestUtilities #65745
    area-System.Security
  • Fix inlining of IPAddress ctor #65735
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][jit] Remove support for -O=-float32, i.e. treating r4 values a… #65740
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Disable failing EventLogSession.GetProviderNames test #64780
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Centralize regex tree analysis for atomic/capture/backtracking detection #65734
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Make ObjectConverter use ConverterStrategy.Object #65748
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Revisit `PatternContext<TFrame>.PushDataFrame` nullable annotation #65598
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Update GeneratedDllImportAttribute CharSet -> StringMarshalling #65544
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [WIP] ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • [MonoAPI] Split type and function headers, add MONO_API_FUNCTION macro #65446
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improved handling of Antimirov mode in Nonbacktracking Regex engine #65637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/6.0] Add dependencies on EMSDK manifest bands for coherency in installer #65478
  • Reimplement stubs to improve performance #65738
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix Queryable-to-Enumerable overload mapping logic #65569
    area-System.Linq, 7.0.0
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • `ZeroObj` assertions #65257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle direct addresses for statics in `IsFieldAddr` #64846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation #65250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Throw a MarshalDirectiveException when marshalling generic ins… #65743
    area-VM-meta-mono, mono-mirror, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Equalize promoted #64206
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen for pkg #65520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • fix few Filesystem tests on FreeBSD #65059
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, test enhancement
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0

  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Build and cache struct types in llvm.cpp #1854

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question about supporting runtime packs for "parent" RIDs #24077
  • Add support for returning CompletionItem Descriptions from `dotnet complete` #24072
    7.0.1xx
  • Remove Legacy `--` behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #24068
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet tool fails to run tools in localized languages #24059
  • dotnet publish编译时间太长 #24057

Closed

  • DPAPI error messages since updating VS to 17.1.0 #23989

PullRequests

Created

  • Add design for cross-version workloads #24070
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Fix DefaultExcludesInProjectFolder value ignored #24063
    Area-WebSDK
  • Add Visual Studio workloads to dotnet workload list #24005
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Update 6.0.3xx with the 6.0.200 version of files #23977
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Annotate content items for web projects with a special attribute #23973
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1627350 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
    Needs More Work

PullRequests

Created

  • Add main attributes proposal #5817
    Proposal

Merged

  • Updates to pattern match on span of char #5824

Updated

  • Update pattern-variables.md #5781

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected overload resolution using static abstracts in interfaces #59721
  • Code CleanUp 'make field readonly, add 'readonly' when only written by for-loop #59720
  • [Project template] Blank line is not preserved after namespace when file has usings #59719
  • Change signature refactoring window removes "?" when specifying a nullable type when adding parameter #59718
  • Provide option to disable Source Link for Go To Definition #59717
  • quick action 'move type to namespace' not available when using c# 10 file scoped namespaces in VS 2022 #59716
  • Extract Interface or Create new type generates copyright information from origin file including the file name #59715
  • CSharpRecommendationServiceRunner breaks on some bad syntax using a third party api #59714
  • Better handle multiple definitions from Source Link in GTD #59713
  • Add option to always use known symbol servers for embedded and Source Link navigation #59712
  • Investigate using Background Work Indicator for GTD/Source Link #59710
  • API Extensions: ILocalSymbol.IsReadOnly #59709
  • Inheritance margin should follow constructor chains #59697
    17.3
  • Incorrect entries being shown after calling FindEntryPoints #59696
    17.3

Closed

  • Regression of type argument detection in 6.0.101 (CS0411) #59699
  • CallerArgumentExpression with "dynamic" variable not working #59704
    17.2
  • Implicit operator conflicting with `&staticFunction` #59703
  • Compiler generate buggy code when using exception filter with pattern matching #59050
    17.2
  • IDE0073 triggered when header template unspecified #59606
    17.3
  • Remove Unnecessary Braces Refactoring #59628
  • Identify and allow removing redundant braces #52565
    Backlog
  • Refactoring suggestion for redundant braces ({ ... }) #58242
    Backlog
  • Prefer braces does not support removing unnecessary braces #29606
    Backlog
  • Formatter requires two passes in the presence of directives inside lambda block bodies, inside argument lists #57465
    Next
  • Disabled including binaries for generators in latest .net sdk preview #59209
    17.2
  • False positive CS0826 on empty array #59701

PullRequests

Created

  • Extract out cache logic from the LSP pull diagnostics code. #59711
    Area-IDE
  • Break out embedded lang classification from semantic classification. #59708
    Area-IDE
  • Port binary additional text bugfix #59707
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix formatting of attributes at end of file #59706
    Area-IDE
  • Initial support for variable declarations under disjunctive patterns #59702
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use a longer timeout if we previously had a successful Source Link result #59698
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Remove net20 and net45 targets from Roslyn #59705
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add telemetry to log analyzer execution times during background analysis #59480
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into CheckedUserDefinedOperators #59691
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Allow exception local to be used in filter prologue in async methods #59608
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use segmented arrays for VirtualChar storage #59503
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Correctly apply anchor indentation adjustments in the presence of trivia #59654
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle binary files in AdditionalTextComparer.GetHashCode #59660
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59695
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59722
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add LSP spell checking support. #59693
    Area-IDE
  • Copy source file to a temp path instead of using it directly #59685
    Area-IDE
  • Bind declarations of unary and binary checked operators #59644
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-ready-for-review
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers
  • Finalize New Inline Rename UI #59351
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move diagnostic service to LSP layer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Extend scope within nameof in attribute on method #40525
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, 17.1
  • Add support for yield return to CompleteStatementCommandHandler #59683
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor runtime compilation with dynamic assemblies fails #40377
    Discussions
  • Skip authentication on specific razor pages (.razor) #40375
  • .Net Core Web API shows inexplicable behavior with Swagger UI and If-None-Match header #40374
  • Razor view can't render JSON-LD. #40373
  • [Static web assets] Support watch in static web assets #40372
    Backlog
  • A reversed ::deep for scoped css files #40370
  • Static Assets -- what's happening? #40369
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #40367
  • Bug 1487866: [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.3.22118.7] blazorboilerplate "Todo list" page load with System.InvalidOperationException #40368

Closed

  • Upgrading Blazor project requires downloading dotnet hosting 6 for IIS Express too #40251
  • [NativeAOT] - IL trimming warnings. #40315
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Duplicate scopes sent to IdP for OIDC authentication from WebAssembly #40340
  • Blazor: Improve the way data-* can be passed to a component #40300
  • Add GetMultipleFiles() method to InputFileChangeEventArgs and specify exceptions thrown. #40341
  • razor class libraries including javascript files when consuming them via nuget in .net 6 #38371
  • Header names that contain periods are missing when using Kestrel #40349
  • OpenAPI C# client generator generates wrong request media type for corresponding deserializer when multiple response content possible. #40197
    .NET 7 Planning
  • IIS Express Claims to support trailers on Win10 #37831
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • Diffs #40385
  • Enable CA1810 as a warning #40384
  • Code gen #40383
    area-runtime
  • [Do not merge] Test IIS locally on CI #40381
    area-runtime
  • Mark -internal blobs as nonshipping #40380
    area-infrastructure
  • Add missing `BeforeTargets` for IIS local testing #40379
    area-runtime
  • Change 'Blazor component' naming #40378
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Removed duplicated and nested dispatcher invoking. #40366
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

Merged

  • Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40305
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • On platforms that don't support Quic, allow PlatformNotSupportedException #40376
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Annotate SqlServer and Redis caches for nullability #40319
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Only enable trailers/reset/goaway on OSs that support them #40310
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Use LoggerMessageAttribute in more places #40297
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • New TryParseModelBinder #40233
    area-mvc
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917
    breaking-change, area-mvc
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add LinkabilityChecker tool #40342
    area-runtime
  • Added reference to the Deveel's MongoDB #40323
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Preserve user provided Auth header when access token factory not provided #40363
    area-signalr

Created

Updated

  • Add Migration name check #26396
